import java.util.*;
class Debts
{
	public static int check(int x,int y)
	{
		int n;
		if(x%y!=0)
			return 0;
		n=x/y;
		while(n%3==0)
			n=n/3;
		while(n%5==0)
			n=n/5;
		if(n==1)
			return 1;
		else
			return 0;
	}
	public static void main(String[] args)
	{
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		int t,n,m,i,flag,max;
		t=sc.nextInt();
		while(t-->0)
		{
			max=0;
			flag=0;
			n=sc.nextInt();
			int[] arr=new int[n];
			for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			{
				arr[i]=sc.nextInt();
				if(arr[i]>max)
					max=arr[i];
			}
			for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			{
				if(Debts.check(max,arr[i])==0)
				{
					flag=1;
					break;
				}
			}
			if(flag==1)
				System.out.println("No");
			else
				System.out.println("Yes");
		}
	}
}
